ChatMessages.Message: Hey! Guess what? I just got the best birthday surprise!
My friends threw a surprise party for me!
Wow, that’s amazing! Did you have fun?
Oh, it was so much fun! We played games and had a huge cake!
Sounds like a blast! What kind of cake?
That’s awesome! I’m so happy for you!
Thank you! I’m still smiling from ear to ear!
Haha, you deserve it! Happy Birthday once again!
